thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-World Fuel Services Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $2.86

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-World Fuel Services Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $2.86
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - World Fuel Services Corp:
* ORATION REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.25 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $2.86 * WORLD FUEL SERVICES - ‍ Q4 RESULTS REFLECT INCOME TAX CHARGE OF ABOUT $157 MILLION, WHICH INCLUDES $144 MILLION ONE-TIME TRANSITION TAX PAYABLE OVER EIGHT YRS
* QTRLY ‍REVENUE $8.9 MILLION VERSUS $7.8 MILLION​ * Q4 REVENUE VIEW $8.72 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ‍ EXPECT TO ONLY PAY APPROXIMATELY $100 MILLION IN TRANSITION TAX PAYABLE OVER EIGHT-YEAR PAYMENT PERIOD​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
